heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy, except mostly to partly cloudy in the St. Lawrence Valley. Scattered sprinkles, or areas of drizzle and light fog, mainly northeast, and in the southern Greens. Highs mainly in the mid to upper 50s, with some lower 50s northeast, and some lower 60s in the St. Lawrence Valley. North to northwest winds around 5 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly cloudy in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys. Mostly cloudy elsewhere, with the chance of an early sprinkle in the south, and after midnight in the northern mountains. Lows from the mid 40s to around 50, except upper 30s to mid 40s northeast and in the Adirondacks. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly to partly cloudy, except mostly cloudy northeast. Chance of a sprinkle in the northern mountains. Valley highs in the upper 40s to lower 50s, except low to mid 50s in southeastern valleys, and in the broad valleys west. North to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.
